transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker A: Hello? Hello. You were speaking with Timmy?
Speaker B: Yes, hello.
Speaker A: Yeah, hi, this is Shikha from Amber. How are you?
Speaker B: Yeah, good, thank you.
Speaker A: Okay, great to know. So actually we had a discussion regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London?
Speaker B: Yeah, I've actually found.
Speaker A: I'm so sorry, your voice is not coming clearly. Could you please repeat yourself?
Speaker B: Yes, can you hear me now?
Speaker A: Yeah, yeah, much better.
Speaker B: Okay, so basically I've got. Basically I know I've got some place already, so I don't necessarily need. I've booked. I've now have. Actually, I've booked his lab directly, so.
Speaker A: Okay, so have you like booked a student or a private accommodation?
Speaker B: I have applied, yes, I've applied the student accommodation.
Speaker A: Okay, and which accommodation have you got it?
Speaker B: IQ toughness.
Speaker A: IQ toughness.
Speaker B: Yes, yes.
Speaker A: Have you completed your.
Speaker B: Yeah, I've moved in now.
Speaker A: You have moved in as well?
Speaker B: Yeah.
Speaker A: All right, all right. Could you please confirm the resident ID?
Speaker B: Yeah, that's fine. It's 517754.
Speaker A: One second. 51517. Mm.
Speaker B: 754.
Speaker A: 754, that's correct. And you have used this email ID, Timmy Ting1021.
Speaker B: I think I booked with them separately.
Speaker A: So have you used this email ID or a different email id?
Speaker B: Maybe a different one because I've booked with them separately.
Speaker A: Okay, which email ID have you used?
Speaker B: I use 10282102 and@icloud.com.
Speaker A: Okay, you can just text me on a WhatsApp if you have like issue dropping here. You can just confirm me over which email ID have you used?
Speaker B: Yeah, that's fine.
Speaker A: Okay, I have just texted you on a WhatsApp. Just check it there and you can just confirm me which email ID have you used? If it is this one or something else. Okay, thank you. No worries. Thanks.
